content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Isolate and terminate Kubernetes containers Dec 15, 2023—Customers can now isolate or terminate potentially compromised Kubernetes pods when investigating threat incidents in Workbench, Observed Attack Techniques, and Search.
